mudServer.Items
Interface Item

All Known Implementing Classes:
Container, generalItem
public interface Item

Defines methods for which all Items must implement. There are two categories: All methods whose implementation is the same for all items are implemented by extending ItemStd. All methods whose implementation is dependant on each new class of item are defined here, but implemented in the specific class.

Author:
Nemesis
